pkgmetadata.longdescription: # idlib[![PyPI version](https://badge.fury.io/py/idlib.svg)](https://pypi.org/project/idlib/)[![Build Status](https://travis-ci.org/tgbugs/idlib.svg?branch=master)](https://travis-ci.org/tgbugs/idlib)[![Coverage Status](https://coveralls.io/repos/github/tgbugs/idlib/badge.svg?branch=master)](https://coveralls.io/github/tgbugs/idlib?branch=master)A library for working with identifiers of all kinds.
